//overview_example: Looking for a software engineer to work on the next generation of Google Search, improving search quality and user experience.
overview: Superside is looking for a Creative Strategist to join the Creative Services team. You'll be responsible for developing insightful and compelling strategies that will drive creativity across digital, social, web, and brand services.
description: Superside is a natively remote company that provides design and creative services to over 450 ambitious brands globally. As a Creative Strategist, you'll develop clear and compelling digital-first strategies for campaigns across various digital media. You'll work closely with customers to understand their needs, collaborate with creatives to develop idea-led creative, and build trusted relationships with customers. You'll also identify opportunities for strategy and creativity in new and existing customers and recommend new processes and products to increase efficiency. Your expertise in digital advertising and your passion for great creative work will be vital to succeed in this role.
requirements: Expert understanding of digital advertising and the latest technologies, platforms, formats, and strategic approaches
Proven ability to clarify complex challenges and provide original solutions
Experience interpreting data and evaluating creative performance
Diligent and rigorous approach to research and strategy development
Passion for great creative work and understanding of the creative process
Entrepreneurial mindset to drive growth and optimize processes
Confidence in a fast-paced and ever-evolving working environment
Passion for new and disruptive technologies and their application to strategy and creative development
